title: Family Creates Their Own Weather Report On A 'Windy' Day
text: Family Creates Their Own Weather Report On A 'Windy' Day January 2, 2024 A family in Ellabell, Georgia, decided to have some good family fun by making their own weather report. The accent makes it 10 times funnier. [making a donation](https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=FGDHDZKBWWVYW)to Sunny Skyz and help our mission to make the world a better place.
